20110124013601.000|20110124013607.000|CC1|TO THIS REHAB FACILITY, AND ONE 
20110124013607.000|20110124013609.000|CC1|OF THE REASONS IS THAT SURGEONS 
20110124013609.000|20110124013612.000|CC1|HAVE BEEN CONCERNED ABOUT A     
20110124013612.000|20110124013613.000|CC1|BUILDUP OF FLUID IN THE         
20110124013613.000|20110124013615.000|CC1|CONGRESSWOMAN'S BRAIN.          
20110124013615.000|20110124013615.000|CC1|NOW, LAST WEEK THEY INSTALLED A 
20110124013615.000|20110124013616.000|CC1|DRAIN TO DRAIN SOME OF THAT     
20110124013616.000|20110124013617.000|CC1|FLUID AWAY AND THEY DON'T WANT  
20110124013617.000|20110124013618.000|CC1|TO MOVE HER UNTIL THEY CAN      
20110124013618.000|20110124013618.000|CC1|REMOVE THAT DRAIN.              
20110124013618.000|20110124013619.000|CC1|THEY'RE WORRIED ABOUT INFECTION.
20110124013619.000|20110124013619.000|CC1|>> DO WE KNOW IF THIS IS A

20110124013621.000|20110124013622.000|CC1|>> Reporter: DOCTORS WE SPOKE TO
20110124013622.000|20110124013623.000|CC1|TODAY SAID IT IS FAIRLY COMMON
